body:
Just because the earth is not flat doesn't mean agent orange isn't a carcinogen, and Claire Pattison had to spend 10 years in courts to remove lead from paint and toys. 

In China people wouldn't even buy their own milk powder, they would pay double shelf price for a can from Australia. 

There is always people out to make a quick buck by throwing someone under the bus, people scheme and do bad things to each other. You know very well deep down the world is very fucked up, there are plenty badness out there, it is not a candy wonderland so why pretend it is one ?
